insert into app_process_instance_data (instance_id, creator, task_id, task_name, create_time, end_time, data) values (#{instanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{data,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
mapper.update: update app_process_instance_data set instance_id = #{instanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, data = #{data,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update app_process_instance_data set instance_id = #{instanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, instance_id, creator, task_id, task_name, create_time, end_time, data from app_process_instance_data
select id, instance_id, creator, task_id, task_name, create_time, end_time, data from app_process_instance_data where instance_id = #{instanceId} order by id desc limit 0,1
